snippet: Brandon Jacobs, who helped the team win two Super Bowls, will most likely be the choice when the Giants need 1 or 2 yards on third and fourth down.
abstract: NFL Roundup; New York Giants bring back bruising rusher Brandon Jacobs in hopes of shoring up feeble running game; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Brandon Jacobs, who helped the team win two Super Bowls, will most likely be the choice when the Giants need 1 or 2 yards on third and fourth down.

headline.main: Giants Turn Again to Running Back Jacobs
headline.print_headline:
The Giants Turn
To Jacobs Again
